Can you provide a recipe for the vegetable curry?
Plan: 1) Search for a recipe for vegetable curry. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for a recipe for vegetable curry.

Vegetable curry recipe: Ingredients - 2 tbsp oil, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tbsp curry powder, 1 can coconut milk, assorted vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, peas), salt to taste. Instructions - Sauté onion and garlic in oil, add curry powder, stir in coconut milk and vegetables, simmer until vegetables are tender.
